there's a whole universe to explore, and we're dealing with a race of robot=
s that can blend in anywhere. We have intelligent, imaginitive people in th=
is RPG, the possabilities are endless. I think we should have one on the fi=
nal frontier and see what happens. Transformers took trips to Junkion, Nebu=
los, Char, and at least a dozen unnamed planets in the cartoon. Go into the=
 comic and you'll find Hydrus 4 and other planets that were never mentioned=
 in the cartoon. If this group can't find a way to explore a universe of po=
ssabilities then we're pathetic.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Le=
gendarynemasis@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, No=
vember 21, 2001 12:41 PM
  Subject: Re: Debate (important everyone read)


=
         You may have kept the people from going off Cybertron code, which =
would be unrealistic for Cybertrons. If we could expand the RPG past one si=
ngular world then that would create excitement and people would post more o=
ften as there would be more to do. Storys could bloom and develop as charac=
hter can interact with new things. Rather then everyone just fighting each =
other all the time and being fenced in.
